1.invocation: Scan all the files located at the "path/to/files/" file-system directory using the "watch1" watch defined in Xray.

2.invocation: Scan "path/to/files/" directory using the "watch1" and "watch2" watches.

3.invocation: Scan all the zip files under "path/to/files/" using the "w45" and "w67" watches.

4.invocation: Scan tgz files located at "/path/to/files/" directory using the policies defined for project "project-1".

5.invocation: Scan all the tgz files located in the current directory using the policies defined for the "libs-local/release-artifacts/" path in Artifactory.

6.invocation: Scans all the tgz files located at the current directory. Show all known vulnerabilities, regardless of the policies defined in Xray.

7.invocation: Scan all files under "path/to/files/". Show the list of licenses.

8.invocation: Scan all files under "/dir/to/scan/" and produce a JSON file report.

10.invocation: Scan using "/$HOME/file/spec.txt" spec file. Provide licenses information.

11.invocation: Audit the npm project at the current directory using the "watch1" watch.

12.invocation: Audit the npm project at this directory using the "wt1" and "wt2" watches.

13.invocation: Audit the npm project at the current directory using the policies defined for project "project-1".

14.invocation: Audit the npm project using the policies defined for the "libs-local/release-artifacts/" path in Artifactory.

16.invocation: Audit the npm project and show the list of licenses.

18.invocation: Audit the npm project and produce a JSON file.

19.invocation: Audit the npm project and produce a JSON file with licenses.

20.invocation: Audit npm using the "wt1" watche and Server ID "765".

21.invocation: Audit the maven project at the current directory using the "watch1" watch.

22.invocation: Audit the Maven project at this directory using the "wt1" and "wt2" watches.

23.invocation: Audit the maven project at the current directory using the policies defined for project "project-1".

24.invocation: Audit the Maven project using the policies defined for the "libs-local/release-artifacts/" path in Artifactory.

26.invocation: Audit the Maven project and show the list of licenses.

28.invocation: Audit the Maven project and produce a JSON file.

29.invocation: Audit the maven project and produce a JSON file with licenses.

30.invocation: Audit Maven using the "wt1" watche and Server ID "765".

31.invocation: Audit the pip project at the current directory using the "watch1" watch.

32.invocation: Audit the Pip project at this directory using the "wt1" and "wt2" watches.

33.invocation: Audit the pip project at the current directory using the policies defined for project "project-1".

34.invocation: Audit the pip project using the policies defined for the "libs-local/release-artifacts/" path in Artifactory.

36.invocation: Audit the pip project and show the list of licenses.

38.invocation: Audit the pip project and produce a JSON file.

39.invocation: Audit the Pip project and produce a JSON file with licenses.

40.invocation: Audit pip using the "wt1" watche and Server ID "765".

41.invocation: Audit the go project at the current directory using the "watch1" watch.

43.invocation: Audit the go project at the current directory using the policies defined for project "project-1".
